title: His Best Mistake
description: One night with a stranger...Single dad Mark Matthews is focused on making his daughter's life the best he possibly can. Between work and taking care of his little girl, dating and any kind of love life is off the table. That is until he meets the quiet but sexy Daisy O'Rourke, who is as secretive as she is beautiful. Now it's game on.Each book in the Shillings Agency series is a standalone, full-length story that can be enjoyed out of order.Â Series Book #1 Temporarily YoursBook #2 Stealing His HeartBook #3 Seducing the PrincessBook #4 Taking What's HisBook #5 Say You're MineBook #6 His Best Mistake
author: Diane Alberts
